ygData.subject: Yikes!! I worship the wrong god.. HELP!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I am in the process of attempting to start my epic quest. (again) When I created Galadriana, I was pretty much clueless about what religion I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
 I am in the process of attempting to start my epic quest. (again) When I
created Galadriana, I was pretty much clueless about what religion I should
pick and so forth. I for some reason chose Rodcet Nife, well what a mistake
THAT was. I cast illusion drybone on myself.. but the spec's killed me
because of my god.. next time I casted improved invis on myself and got thru
everything  including the spec's BUT  as soon as I cast collaboration on
reania the other guild masters instantly killed me, because of my religion.
 I am currently working on the crate quest in qeynos to up my faction with
opaldarkbriar, and I've smacked old Neclo Rheslar in west karana several
times too. (opal is the necro guildmaster under freeport) . Does anyone have
any tips or hints or any suggestions as to what I can do that could help me
start this part of my epic so i dont get killed every single time??

thanks,
Galadriana Dimystic
level 52 enchantress
